base_layer.node_url.description: A required param! Ethereum node URL. A schema to match to Infura node: https://mainnet.infura.io/v3/<your_api_key>, but any other node can be used.

central.class_cache_size.description: Size of class cache, must be a positive integer.

central.concurrent_requests.description: Maximum number of concurrent requests to Starknet feeder-gateway for getting a type of data (for example, blocks).

central.max_classes_to_download.description: Maximum number of classes to download at a given time.

central.max_state_updates_to_download.description: Maximum number of state updates to download at a given time.

central.max_state_updates_to_store_in_me.description: Maximum number of state updates to store in memory at a given time.

central.retry_config.max_retries.description: Maximum number of retries before the node stops retrying.

central.retry_config.retry_base_millis.description: Base waiting time after a failed request. After that, the time increases exponentially.

central.retry_config.retry_max_delay_mil.description: Max waiting time after a failed request.

central.url.description: Starknet feeder-gateway URL. It should match chain_id.

chain_id.description: The chain to follow. For more details see https://docs.starknet.io/documentation/architecture_and_concepts/Blocks/transactions/#chain-id.

collect_metrics.description: If true, collect metrics for the node.

monitoring_gateway.collect_metrics.description: If true, collect and return metrics in the monitoring gateway.

monitoring_gateway.present_full_config_s.description: A secret for presenting the full general config. If no value is provided, the system will generate one.

monitoring_gateway.starknet_url.description: The URL of a centralized Starknet gateway.

network.header_buffer_size.description: Size of the buffer for headers read from the storage.

network.idle_connection_timeout.description: Amount of time in seconds that a connection with no active sessions will stay alive.

network.peer.ip.description: The ipv4 address of another peer that the node will dial to.

network.peer.peer_id.description: Peer ID to send requests to. If not set, the node will not send requests. for info: https://docs.libp2p.io/concepts/fundamentals/peers/

network.peer.tcp_port.description: The port on the other peer that the node will dial to to use for TCP transport.

network.quic_port.description: The port that the node listens on for incoming quic connections.

network.session_timeout.description: Maximal time in seconds that each session can take before failing on timeout.

network.tcp_port.description: The port that the node listens on for incoming tcp connections.

p2p_sync.num_headers_per_query.description: The maximum amount of headers to ask from peers in each iteration.

p2p_sync.query_timeout.description: Time in seconds to wait for query responses until we mark it as failed

rpc.chain_id.description: The chain to follow. For more details see https://docs.starknet.io/documentation/architecture_and_concepts/Blocks/transactions/#chain-id.

rpc.collect_metrics.description: If true, collect metrics for the rpc.

rpc.execution_config.description: Path to the execution configuration file.

rpc.max_events_chunk_size.description: Maximum chunk size supported by the node in get_events requests.

rpc.max_events_keys.description: Maximum number of keys supported by the node in get_events requests.

rpc.server_address.description: IP:PORT of the node`s JSON-RPC server.

rpc.starknet_gateway_retry_config.max_re.description: For communicating with Starknet gateway, maximum number of retries before the node stops retrying.

rpc.starknet_gateway_retry_config.retry_.description: For communicating with Starknet gateway, base waiting time after a failed request. After that, the time increases exponentially.
For communicating with Starknet gateway, max waiting time after a failed request.

rpc.starknet_url.description: URL for communicating with Starknet in write_api methods.

starknet_url.description: The URL of a centralized Starknet gateway.

storage.db_config.chain_id.description: The chain to follow. For more details see https://docs.starknet.io/documentation/architecture_and_concepts/Blocks/transactions/#chain-id.

storage.db_config.enforce_file_exists.description: Whether to enforce that the path exists. If true, `open_env` fails when the mdbx.dat file does not exist.

storage.db_config.growth_step.description: The growth step in bytes, must be greater than zero to allow the database to grow.

storage.db_config.max_size.description: The maximum size of the node's storage in bytes.

storage.db_config.min_size.description: The minimum size of the node's storage in bytes.

storage.db_config.path_prefix.description: Prefix of the path of the node's storage directory, the storage file path will be <path_prefix>/<chain_id>. The path is not created automatically.

storage.mmap_file_config.growth_step.description: The growth step in bytes, must be greater than max_object_size.

storage.mmap_file_config.max_object_size.description: The maximum size of a single object in the file in bytes

storage.mmap_file_config.max_size.description: The maximum size of a memory mapped file in bytes. Must be greater than growth_step.

storage.scope.description: The categories of data saved in storage.

sync.base_layer_propagation_sleep_durati.description: Time in seconds to poll the base layer to get the latest proved block.

sync.block_propagation_sleep_duration.description: Time in seconds before checking for a new block after the node is synchronized.

sync.blocks_max_stream_size.description: Max amount of blocks to download in a stream.

sync.recoverable_error_sleep_duration.description: Waiting time in seconds before restarting synchronization after a recoverable error.

sync.state_updates_max_stream_size.description: Max amount of state updates to download in a stream.
